testsuite.name: E2E - We learn how to test response from API using cypress

testcase.name: E2E - We learn how to test response from API using cypress API Test - user authorization, create varibale for token
testcase.classname: API Test - user authorization, create varibale for token

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://api.realworld.io/api/articles/
The response we received from your web server was:
> 422: Unprocessable Entity
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://api.realworld.io/api/articles/ Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "authorization": "Token eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6Im1pY2hhbF96ZWxnYUB0ZXN0LnBsIiwidXNlcm5hbWUiOiJtaWNoYWxfemVsZ2EiLCJpYXQiOjE2NjAwNzE4ODMsImV4cCI6MTY2NTI1NTg4M30.dLEp6fB7_9Kr1oHiR5aq_X_lHqRqqlK_cXK0BV38nT8", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/9.5.1 Chrome/94.0.4606.81 Electron/15.3.4 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 87 } Body: {"article":{"tagList":[],"title":"Now1y A3rt2ykuł","description":"test","body":"tes"}}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 422 - Unprocessable Entity Headers: { "date": "Tue, 09 Aug 2022 19:04:43 GMT", "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "content-length": "39", "connection": "keep-alive", "x-powered-by": "Express", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "etag": "W/\"27-BNeuaWQ7DHvW/r+pl+qdJiF06Is\"", "via": "1.1 vegur", "cf-cache-status": "DYNAMIC", "expect-ct": "max-age=604800, report-uri=\"https://report-uri.cloudflare.com/cdn-cgi/beacon/expect-ct\"", "report-to": "{\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https:\\/\\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\\/report\\/v3?s=qNaZwzDgGyOh3PKiqmz4Z%2BWTtZuv5mvpUPJljkNm1Q3IJvAskp4exlz9rEABOp0IZm1rqcXgqY3suJsbknbD6Rx5dj9sOmdZzK2%2BqXFi9qo4TAI3GHqGV81JA0YwVdB3yY%2Fm\"}],\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "nel": "{\"success_fraction\":0,\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "server": "cloudflare", "cf-ray": "7382c2559c21c270-VIE", "alt-svc": "h3=\":443\"; ma=86400, h3-29=\":443\"; ma=86400" } Body: { "errors": { "title": [ "must be unique" ] } }
https://on.cypress.io/request
